mapper.select: SELECT shain.ZAISHOKU_ST, shain.shain_no, shain.shain_nm, shain.busho_nm, shain.yakushoku_nm, shain.nyusha_ymd, shain.taishoku_ymd, taishoku.taishoku_pay, taishoku_renraku, taishoku_jiyu FROM shain LEFT JOIN taishoku ON shain.shain_no = taishoku.shain_no ORDER BY shain.shain_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO taishoku (shain_no, taishoku_jiyu, taishoku_renraku) VALUES (#{shain_no}, #{taishoku_jiyu}, #{taishoku_renraku})
mapper.select: SELECT taishoku_jiyu, taishoku_renraku FROM taishoku WHERE shain_no = #{shain_no}
SELECT shain.shain_no, shain.taishoku_ymd, taishoku.taishoku_jiyu, taishoku.taishoku_renraku FROM shain LEFT JOIN taishoku ON shain.shain_no = taishoku.shain_no WHERE shain.shain_no = #{shain_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE taishoku SET taishoku_jiyu = null, taishoku_renraku = null, taishoku_pay = 0 WHERE shain_no = #{shain_no}
